values: 申请；请求；涂；施；敷；施加；实施；应用；运用；适用；适合；投入；致力于；专注于；踩（刹车）；指称

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 应用；实施（apply的过去分词）；敷上

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指将一事物运用于另一事物之上以发挥其有效作用。
普通用词，着重为达到某一目的而利用某人或某物。
通常指使用手边或就近的人或物以有利于自己。
侧重有利可图或能达到某一实际目的。书面用词。
指使用处于消极状态或未被用过的人或物，可以与use换用，但强调进行选择、充分利用。

bilingual.source: These regulations do not apply to adults.
bilingual.target: 这些规定不应用于成年人。

bilingual.source: Please reboot the sys to apply the changes.
bilingual.target: 请重启系统以应用更改。

bilingual.source: You need to apply it to your daily life.
bilingual.target: 你需要应用于你的日常生活中。

bilingual.source: You can apply tanh to the input layer.
bilingual.target: 你可以将双曲正切函数应用于输入层。

bilingual.source: These skills can apply to any work environment.
bilingual.target: 这些技巧可以应用于任何工作环境。

bilingual.source: The computer needs rebooting to apply the updates.
bilingual.target: 计算机需要重新启动以应用更新。

bilingual.source: Please reload the software to apply the new settings.
bilingual.target: 请重新加载软件以应用新设置。

bilingual.source: I need to restart my computer to apply the updates.
bilingual.target: 我需要重新启动我的电脑以应用更新。

bilingual.source: The generalisation of the theory made it easier to apply.
bilingual.target: 该理论的概括使其更容易应用。

bilingual.source: This course will teach you how to apply design principles.
bilingual.target: 这个课程将教你如何应用设计原理。

list.abstract: apply（英 [əˈplaɪ]，美 [əˈplaɪ]），英语单词，作动词为申请；请求；适用。短语搭配有apply to（适用于）。例句为“I'm writing to apply to be a volunteer.（我写信申请成为一名志愿者。）” apply相关近义词有put in for、enter one's name for等，相关反义词有defy、exempt。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess old Eddie's rules don't apply to everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看样子不是所有的鸟都遵守老艾迪的规矩。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting hypothesis. Let's apply the scientific method, perform an experiment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这假设有意思，套用科学的方法做实验证明吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Also I'm gonna apply it to the brow bone for more dimension.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把它涂在眉骨上，看起来更有轮廓感。

yingyinNormal.en: No. I mean, I'll apply, but I'm not gonna stoop to playing politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才不会，我会去申请啦，但是我才不去耍手段，搞阴谋。

yingyinNormal.en: I do very much know that, in the sense that I don't intend to apply.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我确信我知道的很清楚。事实上，压根我就不打算申请纽约大学。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: What's that piece of tape? Oh, that one doesn't apply to you. You sit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这条黄线又是干嘛的？你用不着担心这个，反正你坐着上厕所。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I was... Anyway, look. I definitely did not apply for your grant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我是……随便了，那个，我绝对没申请过你的基金。

yingyinNormal.en: And I just apply on top of the base. The trick is to blend as best as you can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 涂在粉底的上面，秘诀是尽可能涂匀。

yingyinNormal.en: It takes years to develop one's flexibility! And years longer to apply it in combat!
yingyinNormal.zh: 韧性与柔性要花数年的功夫，能活用在对阵中又得数年。

yingyinNormal.en: So what do you think we can learn from that behavior that we can apply to our own lives?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得我们可以从该行为中学到什么可以运用于自己生活中的？

yingyinNormal.en: I still have to put a cold rag on your head, sing to you and apply VapoRub to your chest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还得在你额头放一块冷毛巾，唱歌给你听，帮你在胸口擦伤风膏。

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to make sure that we're all clear. Standard robotic fighting league rules apply.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是想确认下我们说好了，按照标准机器人格斗联盟规则。

yingyinNormal.en: And then I apply that underneath my lips, the corners of my nose, and just some random spots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 涂抹在我的唇部下方，鼻子两周，以及一些其他需要的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Whose coffin, Sherlock? Please, start your deductions. I will apply some context in a moment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁的棺材呢，夏洛克？请开始你的推理。我稍后就提供背景。

yingyinNormal.en: The law applies to human beings. The same laws don't apply to mutants. They're too dangerous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法律适用于人类，同样的法律不适用于变异人，他们太危险了。

yingyinNormal.en: But how do we apply quantitative metrics to something as subjective as choosing a wedding party?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我们怎么才能把客观的测量用在选择婚宴这种主观的事情上呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I want to apply this to the Ultron program, but Jarvis can't download a data schematic this dense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想把这个用到奥创程序上，但是贾维斯下载不了密度这么大的数据原理图。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway I shake the living crap out of it because it says to shake. And then I begin to apply it on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我使劲摇晃它，因为要求摇晃使用。然后我开始涂抹。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the time to apply. Bankers have more guilt at Christmastime because of It's A Wonderful Life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在是申请的好时机，银行家在圣诞节比较有愧疚感，因为《生活多美好》的关系。

yingyinNormal.en: There was a flyer on the bulletin board at the university: "Roommate wanted. Whistlers need not apply."
yingyinNormal.zh: 大学公告板上的一张传单，"招募室友，吹口哨的勿扰"。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 应用; 运用; 施于

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 申请；请求；适用；有关联；涂抹… 于表面；全神贯注地工作；努力工作；投入使用；把…施于

sense_info_list.en: have relevance or a valid connection, especially of rules or laws

examination_example.sentence: It is designed to <highlight>apply</highlight> primarily to companies such as Google, Apple, Facebook and Amazon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它主要适用于谷歌、苹果、脸书和亚马逊等公司。

examination_example.sentence: They must sort out how the Fourth Amendment <highlight>applies</highlight> to digital information now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们现在必须解决《第四修正案》如何适用于数字信息。

examination_example.sentence: The court should make itself subject to the code of conduct that <highlight>applies</highlight> to the rest of the federal judiciary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法院应当服从适用于联邦司法系统其余部门的行为准则。

sense_info_list.en: make a formal application or request, especially in a written form

examination_example.sentence: Britain is no longer able to <highlight>apply</highlight> for the much more prestigious title of European capital of culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国再也不能申请欧洲文化之都这个更有声望的头衔了。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays anyone <highlight>applying</highlight> for a research post has to have published twice the number of papers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在任何申请研究职位的人都必须发表两倍数量的论文。

examination_example.sentence: Before <highlight>applying</highlight> for university I told everyone that I would study journalism, because writing was, and still is, one of my favorite activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在申请大学之前，我告诉每个人我将学习新闻学，因为写作过去是，现在也仍然是我最喜欢的活动之一。

sense_info_list.en: bring or put into operation or practical use
sense_info_list.zh: 应用; 运用; 施于

examination_example.sentence: The potential of this work <highlight>applied</highlight> to healthcare is very great.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项工作应用于医疗保健的潜力非常大。

examination_example.sentence: We become defensive when criticised, and <highlight>apply</highlight> negative stereotypes to others to boost our own esteem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当受到批评时，我们会变得具有防御性，并把负面的刻板印象施加于他人，以此来提升自己的自尊。

examination_example.sentence: Rosenberg argues convincingly that public-health advocates ought to take a page from advertisers, so skilled at <highlight>applying</highlight> peer pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗森伯格令人信服地指出，公共卫生倡导者应该向广告商学习，他们善于运用同伴压力。

sense_info_list.en: to put or spread something such as paint, cream, etc. onto a surface
to work at something or study something very hard

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 申请；请求；适用；有关联；涂抹… 于表面；全神贯注地工作；努力工作；投入使用；把…施于

sense_info_list.en: make a formal application or request, especially in a written form

examination_example.sentence: You might be the right person for the position you are <highlight>applying</highlight> for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能就是你所申请职位的合适人选。

sense_info_list.en: have relevance or a valid connection, especially of rules or laws

examination_example.sentence: They will never ask for passwords, be consistent, document decisions, consider the source used and be aware that other laws may <highlight>apply</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将永远不会要求密码，保持一致，记录决定，考虑使用的来源，并意识到其他法律可能适用。

examination_example.sentence: This only <highlight>applies</highlight> to American space activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这仅适用于美国的太空活动。

sense_info_list.en: bring or put into operation or practical use

examination_example.sentence: But Schellenberg remains highly critical of how the concept of plasticity has been <highlight>applied</highlight> in his field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是舍伦贝格仍然对可塑性概念在他的领域中的应用持高度批评态度。

sense_info_list.en: put or spread something on a surface, such as paint, cream, or others
use physical force in order to make something happen or work
give full attention to a task; work hard

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指将一事物运用于另一事物之上以发挥其有效作用。
通常指使用手边或就近的人或物以有利于自己。
指使用处于消极状态或未被用过的人或物, 可以与 use 换用, 但强调进行选择、充分利用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 申请；请求；适用；有关联；涂抹… 于表面；全神贯注地工作；努力工作；投入使用；把…施于

sense_info_list.en: make a formal application or request; especially in a written form

examination_example.sentence: In addition, it is necessary to <highlight>apply</highlight> for graduation when you're near the time that you will be completing your graduation requirements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，当你即将完成毕业要求时，有必要申请毕业。

examination_example.sentence: What is the first decision you should make in preparing to <highlight>apply</highlight> for a place in a university?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在准备申请大学时，你应该做的第一个决定是什么？

examination_example.sentence: Which university you are going to <highlight>apply</highlight> to?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你打算申请哪所大学？

sense_info_list.en: bring or put into operation or practical use

examination_example.sentence: In 2007, my lab at Clemson University published a study in the Journal of <highlight>Applied</highlight> Microbiology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2007年，我在克莱姆森大学的实验室在《应用微生物学杂志》上发表了一项研究。

examination_example.sentence: Now educators are experimenting with ways to <highlight>apply</highlight> this model to academic subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，教育工作者正在研究如何将这种模式应用于学术科目。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers have found that students who sign up to tutor others work harder to understand the material, recall it more accurately and <highlight>apply</highlight> it more effectively.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，和其他学生相比，给别人提供辅导的学生在知识理解上会更下功夫，知识回顾更准确，知识应用更有效。

sense_info_list.en: have relevance or a valid connection; especially of rules or laws

examination_example.sentence: The tax will <highlight>apply</highlight> to regular and diet sodas, as well as other drinks with added sugar, such as Gatorade and iced teas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项赋税不仅适用于佳得乐、冰茶等其他含糖饮料，也适用于常规汽水及无糖汽水。

examination_example.sentence: The menu rule only <highlight>applies</highlight> to restaurants that serve standardised portion sizes and have fifteen or more locations nationwide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 菜单规则仅适用于提供标准化份量的餐厅，并且在全国范围内有15个或更多的位置。

sample.mean: n. 设备；复杂结构；注释、文选及其他资料；器官
n. 衣服；衣着；教会法衣上的绣花装饰
adj. 清晰可见的；清晰明了的；明显的；表面上的；貌似真实的；从地球上看到的
v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版
v. 抚慰；平息；缓解；满足
v. 附加；增补
n. 食欲；满足人体需要的欲望；对…的渴望
v. 鼓掌表同意；赞扬；表示强烈赞同
adj. 相关的；适用的
n. 申请人
adj. 大得可察觉到的；相当可观的
v. 认识到…的全部价值；赏识；重视；欣赏；充分理解；充分意识到；价格上涨；价值提升；为…表示感谢
v. 逮捕；理解；领会；忐忑不安（或心怀恐惧）地期待
n. 忧虑；担心；恐惧；疑惧；理解；领悟；逮捕
adj. 适当的；合适的；恰当的；个人的；特殊的；属于某一个人所特有的；个性的
v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许
v. 任命；委派；约定；受权处置；规定；注定；命令；颁布法令
v. 依从；顺从；遵从；服从；符合特定标准
v. 暗示；暗指；意指；暗示（或意味着）…为必然结果
v. 回答；答复；回信；复信；回应；回击

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指将一事物运用于另一事物之上以发挥其有效作用。
通常指使用手边或就近的人或物以有利于自己。
指使用处于消极状态或未被用过的人或物，可以与 use 换用，但强调进行选择、充分利用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 申请；请求；适用；有关联；涂抹… 于表面；全神贯注地工作；努力工作；投入使用；把…施于

sense_info_list.en: make a formal application or request, especially in a written form

examination_example.sentence: Who can <highlight>apply</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁可以申请？

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>applied</highlight> successfully for the training program at the School of Toronto Dance Theatre, and moved to Toronto to attend the program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我成功申请了多伦多舞剧院学校的培训项目，并搬到多伦多参加培训。

sense_info_list.en: bring or put into operation or practical use

examination_example.sentence: The study showed the animals had figured out how to <highlight>apply</highlight> what they learned about human faces during training to new faces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，动物们已经知道如何将他们在训练中所学到的关于人脸的知识应用到新面孔上。

sense_info_list.en: have relevance or a valid connection, especially of rules or laws

examination_example.sentence: And the same rule <highlight>applies</highlight> to an angry mouth having the same meaning as angry eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样的规则也适用于愤怒的嘴和愤怒的眼睛有相同的含义。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Apply</highlight> icing eyes and nose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用冰敷眼睛和鼻子。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指将一事物运用于另一事物之上以发挥其有效作用。
通常指使用手边或就近的人或物以有利于自己。
指使用处于消极状态或未被用过的人或物，可以与 use 换用，但强调进行选择、充分利用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 申请；请求；适用；有关联；涂抹… 于表面；全神贯注地工作；努力工作；投入使用；把…施于

sense_info_list.en: make a formal application or request, especially in a written form

examination_example.sentence: I have <highlight>applied</highlight> to be a volunteer for the 2022 Asian Games.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我已经申请成为2022年亚运会的志愿者。

examination_example.sentence: I’m writing to <highlight>apply</highlight> to be a volunteer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我写信申请成为一名志愿者。

examination_example.sentence: Even worse, Meucci never <highlight>applied</highlight> for a patent ( 专 利 ) on his invention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更糟糕的是，梅乌奇从未为他的发明申请专利。

sense_info_list.en: have relevance or a valid connection, especially of rules or laws

examination_example.sentence: Offer <highlight>applies</highlight> to IMAX 3D Cinema, SIMEX and The Science of Survival exhibition only.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 优惠仅适用于IMAX 3D影院、SIMEX和生存科学展览。

sense_info_list.en: bring or put into operation or practical use

examination_example.sentence: Did you know you can <highlight>apply</highlight> (应用) the same way to old clothing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你知道你可以用同样的方法来处理旧衣服吗？
